name: PDF Optimizer Suite v3.5.0 (Silent Mode & Fixes)
body:
## ðŸš€ Release v3.5.0

### Major Improvements
* **Silent Batch Processing:** No more annoying popup windows! Processing happens in the background with system tray notifications. Select 100 files and optimize them all at once.
* **Fixed Russian Encoding:** Context menu entries in Russian now display correctly without encoding errors.
* **Installer:** Self-healing installer with automatic dependency management (Python 3.12, Ghostscript, ImageMagick).

### Installation
1. Download **PDF_Optimizer_Suite_v3.5.0_Installer.exe**.
2. Run as Administrator.
3. Right-click any PDF -> Select Profile.
